title: Bag, 1950–2000
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: Warp faced weave. Pattern in stripes created by warp floats. Tassels and strap also warp-faced weave with floats. Note the chevron effect in the narrow brown stripe caused by a change from the S direction of the yarn to a Z directi
description: Bag with warp patterned design. Four pockets of each of the three major stripes on the front of the bag. Tassels at each side of nine narrow woven bands with long twisted warp ends. Narrow woven strap as handle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bag, 1950–2000.Medium: wool
Technique: Warp faced weave. Pattern in stripes created by warp floats. Tassels and strap also warp-faced weave with floats. Note the chevron effect in the narrow brown stripe caused by a change from the S direction of the yarn to a Z directi. 1987-54-1.
